title: One top technician says these six stocks could make or break the market
text: Stocks that could make the market.

title: Facebook executive meeting with lawmakers ahead of FTC settlement
text: Facebook Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg is meeting with U.S. lawmakers on Capitol Hill on Tuesday ahead of an expected settlement with the Federal Trade Commission (FTC), a spokesman for Senator Jerry Moran said.

title: Buy Facebook And AMD On China Trade Drama
text: The market is falling as many worry that rising tariffs will dampen the U.S. economy.

title: Sen. Josh Hawley: The FTC needs to get tough on Facebook
text: Sen. Josh Hawley (R-Missouri) joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss calls for the FTC to punish Facebook.

title: Facebook is being sued by a Polish drug prevention group over free speech violation
text: Facebook’s efforts to shut down harmful and malicious content on its platform have landed it in a European courtroom, after an anti-drug abuse organization in Poland claimed that a freeze on its Facebook Pages is a violation of its rights to free speech. The Civil Society Drug Policy Initiative (Społeczna Inicjatywa Narkopolityki in Polish, which goes […]

title: How Facebook might hold up against a $5 billion fine from FTC
text: Anthony DiClemente, senior internet analyst at Evercore ISI, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss how the FANG stocks are performing in the market.

title: Facebook is facing a $5 billion fine from the FTC
text: Will Power, analyst at Robert W. Baird, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss Apple's commitment to privacy as other tech companies run into issues surrounding data security.

title: Facebook unveils an automated ad builder and an appointment manager for small businesses
text: Facebook said it’s launching a number of new products aimed at small businesses today — which is appropriate, since we’re currently in the middle of National Small Business Week.

title: $5 billion fine is a 'bargain' for Facebook, top US senators say
text: A bipartisan letter published Monday puts additional pressure on the FTC as it weighs steps to punish Facebook for mishandling users' personal information.
